00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <mfhdf.h>
00021 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00022 
00038 MTKt_status MtkFileAttrGet(
00039   const char *filename,    
00040   const char *attrname,    
00041   MTKt_DataBuffer *attrbuf  )
00042 {
00043   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00044   MTKt_status status;      /* Return status */
00045   intn hdf_status;
00046   int32 sds_id = FAIL;
00047 
00048   if (filename == NULL)
00049     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00050 
00051   /* Open HDF File */
00052   hdf_status = sds_id = SDstart(filename, DFACC_READ);
00053   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00054     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDSTART_FAILED);
00055 
00056   /* Read attribute. */
00057   status = MtkFileAttrGetFid(sds_id, attrname, attrbuf);
00058   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00059 
00060   /* Close HDF File */
00061   hdf_status = SDend(sds_id);
00062   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00063     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDEND_FAILED);
00064   sds_id = FAIL;
00065 
00066   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00067 
00068 ERROR_HANDLE:
00069   if (sds_id != FAIL)
00070     SDend(sds_id);
00071   return status_code;
00072 }
00073 
00079 MTKt_status MtkFileAttrGetFid(
00080   int32 sds_id,            
00081   const char *attrname,    
00082   MTKt_DataBuffer *attrbuf  )
00083 {
00084   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00085   MTKt_status status;      /* Return status */
00086   intn hdf_status;
00087   int32 attr_index;
00088   int32 hdf_datatype;
00089   int32 count;
00090   MTKt_DataType datatype;       /* Mtk data type */
00091   MTKt_DataBuffer attrbuf_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; /* Temp attribute buffer */
00092   char attr_name_tmp[MAXSTR];
00093 
00094   if (attrname == NULL || attrbuf == NULL)
00095     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00096 
00097   /* Find attribute index */
00098   hdf_status = attr_index = SDfindattr(sds_id, attrname);
00099   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00100     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDFINDATTR_FAILED);
00101 
00102   /* Get attribute information */
00103   hdf_status = SDattrinfo(sds_id, attr_index, attr_name_tmp, &hdf_datatype, &count);
00104   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00105     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDATTRINFO_FAILED);
00106 
00107   /* Convert to Mtk Data Type */
00108   status = MtkHdfToMtkDataTypeConvert(hdf_datatype, &datatype);
00109   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS)
00110     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00111 
00112   /* Allocate Memory */
00113   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(1, count, datatype, &attrbuf_tmp);
00114   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS)
00115     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00116 
00117   /* Read attribute */
00118   hdf_status = SDreadattr(sds_id, attr_index, attrbuf_tmp.dataptr);
00119   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00120     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDREADATTR_FAILED);
00121 
00122   *attrbuf = attrbuf_tmp;
00123 
00124   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00125 
00126 ERROR_HANDLE:
00127 
00128   MtkDataBufferFree(&attrbuf_tmp);
00129 
00130   return status_code;
00131 }
